data.name: DepthQVR_AQUA
data.detailed_description:
DepthQVR_AQUA is a fun, engaging, immersive ride & casual gaming experience, a layered experiential environment filled with intuitive interaction, story immersion, and exhilaration.

This novel application of virtual reality technology simulates a traditional indoor amusement ride on which passengers aboard a guided vehicle travel through specially lit scenes that typically contain video, animation, sound, music, game interactives, and special effects.

We support Steam VR and 'Desktop' (non VR) gameplay modes; 'Desktop' is supported via Keyboard/Mouse and Xbox Controller.

The AQUA themeology is a gaming skin, a stage dress that sits atop our evolving and entertaining game mechanics.



The addition of optional motion simulation technology transforms DepthQVR® into a realistic ride experience for out-of-home PC Café, Entertainment Attractions, Brand Experiences, and Educational Attractions. The ride's immersive participatory nature, playful ‘natural-touch’ interactivity, and exhilarating body motion surprises and delights viewers of all ages, sparking lasting memories.

data.short_description: DepthQVR_AQUA is a fun, engaging, immersive ride & casual gaming experience. Also configurable for out-of-home PC Café, Entertainment Attractions, Brand Experiences, and Educational Attractions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
